comment: He was a good teacher and very responsive. Do the work and ask for help and you'll be fine.

I had him during summer semester for POLS 4412 (urban affairs & problems) and it was the easiest class ive ever taken ! Professor Kang truly wants all his students to be successful. There were weekly discussion posts / quizzes, and the final is a 5-7 pg research paper. Nothing he assigned was difficult at all. Also, the textbook is NEEDED ! :)
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Urban Affairs and Politics Online- Primarily reading and discussions after. 2 month summer class, essentially one, and 2 weeks to finish a research paper w no additional work. He gave you options for discussions that were interesting an applicable to live. He clearly wants you to enjoy the class, not hate it by making the work excessive!

Dr. Kang is the best POLS1101 teacher! His course outline is very clear & he grades very fair. We had 4 discussion & 4 test plus the final paper. He even gave us an extra credit opportunity at the end. You will need to read the book to pass the test but the test arent difficult! Hes very understanding and cares about the success of his students.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This was an easy online class with clear grading criteria. You have to do a discussion post every 3 weeks, 1 original post and respond to 2 classmates. Used book for my discussion posts. Plus, you will have a test every 3 weeks with no lockdown browser and answers can be found online. Your last assignment will be a 5-7 page paper. Should be easy A.

Do not even hesistate to take him. Easiest class i have ever taken and he is such a nice guy. I took the online class and he makes the work so spread out and is so easy to accomplish. This was my first online class and has made me want to take more! TAKE HIM!!!!!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Dr. Kang structured this course to be helpful for a POLS major, but easy for everybody just filling the gen-ed requirement. Test and discussion every few weeks. One 5-7 page paper, but have no fear because it's super easy. Don't need the textbook, although it is a good textbook and I enjoyed it. Wonderful professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Super easy A. Even if you get B's on most of the tests like me (even got a C on one), if you do all the blog posts EXACTLY as the rubric says (cannot stress this enough) you will get an A. No final, just an easy paper on literally whatever you want. Finished mine in two sittings and got a 100%. Take him if you care about yourself.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: There's discussion boards but are mainly opinion based, the tests are super easy and he posts study guides, and one final paper that everyone got a 100 on. Most chill class ever and you don't need the textbook
rating_tags: Graded by few things--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Best option for you gen ed pols class. Modules due every other week and a 5-7 essay for the final (which isnt bad). Highly recommend
rating_tags: Respected--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: There are only a couple modules that have a discussion and test in each that are open for a whole month. Very manageable online class!
rating_tags: Respected--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: This is a really easy class if you just due the work. Theres 4 tests and discussion questions and your final is a 5-7 page paper. The class is graded by a few things however the discussion questions you either you do it & get 100 or don't and get a 0 & you have 3 weeks to do it all. Whoever say not to take this class they just didn't do anything.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Kang is an amazing professor! His grading material is clear and to the point. 5 discussions, 5 tests (1 of the test being a syllabus test), and 1 paper thats 5-7 pages. The paper can be about anything, as long as you can relate it to American Goverment. Please, if you want an easy A and caring professor, take this class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took this class completely online and I really enjoyed it. His instructions were very clear and there were only a couple of modules. He gives you good resources and feedback and the assignments aren't that difficult. I definitely recommend taking his online class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria

comment: Great professor. Take them over the summer online and it was a breeze. As long as you keep up with the due dates and log in at least once a day you will make an A. The only thing that could prevent you from getting an A would honestly only be yourself. Great response time on emails and clear grading criteria.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: The BEST professor! Dr. Kang is so well organized and wants you to learn and succeed. I took his online class this summer and there was a lot of reading, but it was totally manageable! 5 tests, 5 discussion posts and a final 5-7 page paper. You will absolutely love him. Take him!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I loved Dr. Kang! I took his POLS 1101 class online this summer and it was great! There's lots of reading, but very little assignments. There's 5 tests (all multiple choice and 1 is just a syllabus test) and 5 weekly discussions (2 original posts and 2 replies to other students for each). There's no midterm or final, but there is one 5-7 page essay
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: if you need to take a government class for GenEd and you want the easiest A of your life, take Dr Kang especially if you can get him online. 5 tests, 5 discussions, 1 essay but the essay is easy and lightly graded. Very easy & basic American Gov class that gets easier with Dr Kang as the professor
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria

comment: Please take Professor Kang if you have the chance! Easily one of the few best at KSU. Clear grading criteria, which I appreciated for an online class. Just do the readings and use the extra study material he provides and you'll be guaranteed an A on your discussions and tests, not even to mention how much you'll learn! Very pleased :)
rating_tags: Respected--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Very intelligent, easy to communicate with, respectful of students and their differing opinions. He focuses on the big picture and relevant issues. Also brought in some local politicians. Have never had a professor who cares as much as he has.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Caring

comment: The assignments are simple and to the point. Some writing but its absolutely doable. You just have to do the work correctly and you'll pass. Teacher himself is pretty cool too.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: THE best professor! He cares about your success. Uses lots of interesting real life examples.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Kang has been one of the best professors I've taken at KSU. He keeps the class interesting and his discussion topics helped me make sense of the stuff we read.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria
